title: How do I create a contact? How do I assign a photo to a contact?
answer: Creating a contact Go to Contacts, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111055), and select a save mode. On the contacts editing screen, enter the contact details, and save the contact. Assigning a photo to a contact ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111056) You cannot assign a photo to a contact saved to the micro-SIM card. Method 1: Go to Contacts and touch a contact. On the contact details screen, t[ouch the contact photo area to take a photo or choose a photo from the gallery](). [Method 2: Go to Contacts and touch a contact. On the contact details screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111057) to edit the contact. Touch the contact photo area to take a photo or choose a photo from the gallery.]()
